short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sorts the products on the Foodstuffs websites by price per unit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sort grocery products by price or unit-price on major New Zealand supermarkets PakNSave and New World. This is handy since the parent company removed sort by price in October 2024 which many customers find frustrating.

How it works:
1) A dropdown menu is displayed on search result pages offering the default 'popularity' ordering plus four additional sorting methods:
* Price - High to Low
* Price - Low to High
* Unit Price - High to Low
* Unit Price - Low to High

2) Selecting an option will reorder the results on the current page and this usually works well enough. The sorting method chosen be applied to subsequent product searches on the same supermarket site.
